Class DeviceManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • pl.com.impaq.main.controller.managers.DeviceManager

  • public class DeviceManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Version:
    1.0 Handles all the operations related to devices, and manages them for the POS (PointOfSale)
    Author:
    Agustin Cabra
